name: Wood Chopping Simulator Arcade Game
description:
Hello!

This Wood Chopping Simulator is the first Unity game (or even full game with graphics) that I've ever made. The UI, Sound Effects, and Player Sprite were all made by me. Every other sprite was made by Cam. Music from Casual Game Vol 2 pack (here on Itch.io.

Hope you all enjoy! I'm gonna be working on making a lot of games from now on since I just graduated and I actually have time to pursue this now. This game is free, but if you want to support me for making this and in my quest to make more ambitious games, feel free to pay what you think I've earned :]

Our little game studio is officially called Shadow Busters Game Studio as of now, so don't forget it ;)

DISCLAIMER: Nobody else can distribute this game or take credit for it.

Let us know if there are any problems with the game, and we will try to fix them for you guys.
